page.title: 10R.A.F. W'field - Facilities
page.content: The personnel keep fit in a large sports hall with facilities for bowling, gymwork, basketball and most other American sports, also there are 2 soft-ball pitches. They have a travel agent for booking holidays to most places. There are a number of shops, including a petrol (gas) station, Post Office (all their mail goes via New York), general stores, Off Licence, barbers, tool hire centre, craft centre, hardware shop, plumbers, launderette, electricians. For entertainments they have the latest films and there is also a snooker and billiards room.
